description:
This market refers to the LoL match between MVK Esports and CTBC Flying Oyster in the LCP Regular Season, scheduled for January 25 at 1:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "MVK Esports" if MVK Esports secures the most drakes across all games in the match. 

This market will resolve to "CTBC Flying Oyster" if CTBC Flying Oyster secures the most drakes across all games in the match.

If both teams secure the same number of drakes across all games in the match, this market will resolve 50-50.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the LoL match between MVK Esports and CTBC Flying Oyster in the LCP Regular Season, scheduled for January 25 at 1:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "MVK Esports" if MVK Esports win the match against CTBC Flying Oyster.

This market will resolve to "CTBC Flying Oyster" if CTBC Flying Oyster win the match against MVK Esports.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: MVK Esports vs CTBC Flying Oyster (BO3) - LCP Regular Season

question: Series: Most drakes?
